oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Arthur Smith Trio recordings - tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 of 2 of various performances featuring Arthur Smith (performer) and the Arthur Smith Trio (performers).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Arthur Smith; Arthur Smith Trio
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Nellie's Blue Eyes (Arthur Smith Trio) -- I'm Bound To Ride (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Nellie's Blue Eyes (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Cheatham Country Breakdown (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Dixon Country Blues (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Smith's Waltz (Arthur Smith) -- Blackberry Blossom (Arthur Smith) -- Sing Those House Of David Blues (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Sugar Tree Stomp (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Across The Blue Ridge Mountains (Arthur Smith Trio) -- Lonesome Rambler's Blues (Arthur Smith Trio)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Arthur, 1898-1971; Arthur Smith Trio;
